sect2.title: SVVP
sect2.para: The SVVP program has validated our &productnameshort; paravirtualized drivers. Thus, Microsoft customers running copies of Windows* Server they have acquired and licensed from Microsoft directly can receive technical support for Windows* Server in virtualized environments. See for more information.
